query: How does the observed radial velocity of the Local Interstellar Cloud compare to previous predictions, and what motivates the proposal of an extension of the Hyades Cloud boundary?

citation_function_classification.justification: The query asks to compare observed radial velocity with prior predictions (comparison) and seeks the reasons behind proposing an extension of the Hyades Cloud boundary (motivation).
